content.detailedDescription: In 1973,july or aug. in niles il.,three of my friends and i were star watching laying on the ground, face up looking at the sky. in 1 second something streeked from west horison to east horison and left a green trail that stayed illuminated for 2 to 3 seconds in its flight path, no noise at all. unknown mach speed.  it went that fast. did not see any craft because of the speed it traveled. it had to be in earth atmospere, 10,000 to 100,000 feet high i figure. it was not in space. i have never seen anything that fast since in my life. all 4 of us saw it, all 4 said what was it, got very freeked and had no idea of what we had just seen. we did figure we had seen a ufo.
content.summary: Object went east to west, horison to horison in 1 sec, left green trail in sky for 2 to 3 sec., 4 witnesses to the event

content.detailedDescription:
I was recently talking with a friend of mine about a very strange event i had witnessed earlier this year and he suggested i report this to mufon.
so here i go.


  late february or early march of this year(2009) (sorry i do not have exact date and time i know i should have written it down!) in the city of beaverton oregon at exactly 4:55am i was awakend by a loud explosion, this explosion was not like a gunshot which i did hear occasionally in the area, this was more like a sound a large power transformer gives off when it blows!  it was so powerful it shook my entire apartment and rattled the windows. i immediately jumped up out of bed frightened and looked out my bedroom window.  my bedroom window faced our apartment complexes small parking lot and just past the parking lot is a fence followed by houses on the next block over.

through my window i looked out and across the parking lot and over an adjacent house i noticed two strange slowly pulsating stationary lights. one light a was dark red and one a dark blue.  these lights were spaced maybe 20-25 feet apart, one of them appeared to be right above the roof of this house and the other other appeared to be slightly lower just at the fence line level between 2 houses. 

at almost the moment i fixed my eyes on these 2 strange lights i heard a police megaphone kick on and the voice of an officer specifically warning "do not leave your residence, this is the police stay inside your home" at this point i became curious, alarmed about what was going on the next block over so i quickly threw on some clothes on, stepped outside and tried to get a better look at exactly what i was seeing some 100 feet away above this house.  

i watched these lights above this house, staring at them...I have never
seen anything quite like this before. i'm a cigarette smoker and spent alot of time on my porch looking in this direction.  this was something bizarre!  i cautiously decided to try to get closer look so i walked about half way across the parking lot with my eyes fixed on the 2 objects when i noticed the red colored light had dissapeared, just vanished! about 3 seconds later i could hear the police saying something but i could not make it out, their voices raised...And then immediately following that they began focusing spotlights at the top of a tall tree sitting next to this house.   

they were scanning the top of this tree with the spotlights for about 15
seconds. apparently looking for something, the object that vanished..Or maybe from their vantage point they spotted something else that i did not see from my line of sight.  at this point i got scared and decided for my own personal safety that i should not continue any farther across the parking lot and turned around. 

i then decided to walk to the enterance of the apartment complex and look down the street in the direction of the next block over and i noticed an unmarked police car blocking both lanes of the next road over, it had its headlights off, i could see it was an unmarked because the flashers were on and illuminating the hood and roof of the car and it was not marked like a normal beaverton police cruiser. 

i have told this story to a few people, and most have written the red and blue lights i saw off as comming from police cruisers on the next street, but i know these strange lights or orbs or whatever that they were, were definatly not comming from the cruisrs and they were not reflections. they were hovering objects maybe the size of basketballs and once they disapeared the police were searching the trees for them. 

later that same day i was perplexed by what it was i had witnessed, i could not get it out of my mind.  it was eating at me because of how unusual it was so i contacted the washington county sheriffs department from my work phone during my lunch break.  i got a gal on the phone who immediately put me on hold after a brief rundown of my question..I was put on hold for more then 15 mins and eventually i was transfered to what i was told was a 'corporal' who informed me that the sheriffs department had no record of officers on sw hazel st that morning. 

the next day after work i walked over to the next street over and knocked on the door of 4 houses and asked the residents what it was that they had seen, unfortunately 3 out of the 4 were hispanic and spoke little to no english and the one who did talk did not know what it was himself.

i know it sounds crazy, but this is really what i saw that morning, im sure someone in the neighborhood or complex heard and seen this besides me.
content.summary: Red and blue spheres in police spotlight

content.detailedDescription: We were driving west on i-66 and noticed three bright spherical objects in the sky to the southwest. one appeared larger and brighter than the other and the other two appeared about the same size. all of them appeared to be falling toward the earth, which is what caught our attention -- their trails weren't horizontal like an airplane's. gradually, the larger one's trail grew smaller as it fell toward the horizon and the other two appeared to merge together as they fell. at first we thought it was space debris but it when the objects merged together, we changed our minds. throughout the event, we felt no fear or anxiety -- just excitement and curiousity -- and we flipped to a 24 hours news station but there wasn't anything about what we'd seen. after about 7 minutes, the objects reached the treeline and we could no longer see them.
content.summary: 3 bright spheres falling with trails

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way down my driveway to take one of my daughters friends home. upon coming to the end of the driveway looking across an open field i noticed a bright white tube shaped light that seem to appear above the tree line.I was yelling for my kids to look at the object but they were busy talking. as i watched it shoot across the skyline at an immense speed from east to west. at first i thought it was a meteor but it was too low in the sky. as it traveled at a very high rate of speed it suddenly made 40-45 degree angle upwards and disappeared mid sky. the feeling i had afterward was sheer excitement. i have lived near the aberdeen proving grounds for 42 yrs of my life and have seen my share of strange objects in the sky.Although the proving grounds does not test airplanes it does test weapons.So i am  very sure that what i saw was not of military origin.
content.summary: Long "neon" tube appeared in sky over apg aberdeen proving grounds.

content.detailedDescription: I was out with my friends at a fire when we saw a teardrop that was blue go by in the sky. we all saw it and we had no idea what is was.
content.summary: Tear drop shape in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Standing in my backyard looking into the sky (facing north) i noticed a bright white light moving across the sky from west to east. it was a very clear night (no haze or overcast). the light seemed to be at the hight of a commercial jet but being at night it was difficult to tell. as the light moved more directly overhead i saw a stream of green light project from one side. seconds later a red boomerang shaped object appeared to the rear and to the left of the bright light. this continued until the object reached about 2:30 in the eastern sky. it then suddenly dissapeared.
content.summary: Red boomerang shape

content.detailedDescription: Ive been terrized for 10 long months now.  have had more clamps then i do body.  tried to be friends with these guys but the ones left on my land and oin my neighborhood are not good at all.. they are greens and have possibilaty traped a wonderful gray alien in side of my body.. left to die in spirit form.  i have billions of little cloan souls in side of my body. my daily routene is to try to get as many of them out as posible.  my eyes are now distroyed,my bones are now distroyed, i no longer have a life left.  every day and nght i'm going threw hell.  i killed my self 2 times and they keep saveing my life just to continue to distroy my life.  im now considering driving my van off of a cliff hoping that will free me but probably  not since they are very good healers.  im not aloud to live and im not aloud to die. i can no longer work and im now in total isolation.  im only 40 years of age and my life is now ruiened.  i have more clamps than i have a body.  they keep clamping and un clamping making me clinge and i now can barley move.  my 14 year old child is clamped as well but at least theres no wires with it.  they constantly heat my body up just like right now threw there wires that go with the clamps.  ive tried to be friends with them but all they want to do is distroy me for no reason.  ive been praying for 9 months and cant get god and jesus they have new technology to block prayers.  just dont know what to do any more. i really wish i never moved to this state.  pleas help me!!!!  angel francisco  104 g and e circle inwood wv, 25428------( 304) 229-6109
content.summary: Very beautiful ship have seen many/ this one had red lights on it.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night at around 2:45 am, i let our big orange cat out so he could do big orange cat related things. i was swaddled in my robe against the the november chill. i was wide awake from too much coffee earlier in the day and decided to have a cigarette on the porch.

i live in the middle of the city and our house is located almost directly under the path of incoming air traffic from memphis international airport. 3am is magic time because fedex recieves most of their overnight packages starting then. i can sit outside and literally see the rivets on the underbelly of incoming cargo planes. 

so, i am sitting on the porch, just flicked the cigarette in the yard (i'll pick it up later), and petting my big orange kitty, sam, when it dawns on me that the air traffic has thinned to nearly zero. maybe it was a slow night in the overnight shipping business...Who knows, right? sometimes it's slow, sometimes it extremely heavy. at this point, i get up to go back inside.

just as i am walking opening the door, i hear the doppler effect of really loud, fast engines. the cat scurries in and i walk back out. i missed the first jet, but not the second and third. memphis int. has a national guard base within it's borders, so again, not a big thing to see fighter jets landing or taking off. what made me stay outside was the fact that these guys aren't landing. instead they are flying around, criss-crossing the city. 

i sit back down on the steps and look up. as soon as i look up, i see a shooting star. i think, "rad!!! jets and meteors!" the shooting star appeared on the horizon directly in front of me then skimmed the atmosphere from a six o'clock position to about the mid-way point in the sky from my point of view (figure that out in your mind). it was bright white and awesome. at this point the jet sounded as if they pulled off their engines and went in for a landing.

then the shooting star reappeared...

high, very high in the sky, directly over head. i stared at it and thought, "huh...It slowed down." at this point, i was still thinking it was a meteor or something. then the damn then made a slow, wide arch to my left and doubled back on itself. it then made a very fast, serpentine movement back to the six o'clock position and quickly faded from view.

i sat there and it occured to me that i had seen a ufo. i couldn't sleep. i literally sat on the porch for half an hour, then sat on the couch until daybreak. i was scared for some reason because right before the thing faded from view (and i will swear on my life) there was a flash that lasted a fraction of a second that lit up my street .

i know it wasn't a trick of my eyes because every dog in the neighborhood lost it's mind at the same time.

anyways, that's my story...
content.summary: Shooting star-like

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were sitting on a golf car, behind her parents house after a late campfire. we were watching the sky for roughly an hour. then i saw a relly bright light from the corner of my eye, so i looked at it through the trees, and figured it was the moon. a few minutes later, the bright light had moved into plain view. we watched it for maybe 10 minutes. it was flying very slow, so slow if it was anything else it would have fallen out of the sky. it was very big, as i said before i thought it was the moon. so i got very excited and ran to tell her father to come and check this out, by the time he came out it was the size of a pin head and was very far away. then the wierd thing, a few weeks later we find out we are preagnant for our first child. i have had expierences ever since i was a little boy. but i never put 2 and 2 together. all i have to say to people who think we are crazy, spend atleast an hour looking at the sky a night for a month and tell me you havnt seen anything! i hope you like the story and it is written as i remember it.
content.summary: Very bright and quiet

content.detailedDescription: While letting my dog outside, i was standing on my porch and happened to be looking at the southern sky.  it was clear and dark.  a very bright star-like shaped light appeared from the the tree line cruising very fast in a northerly direction.  it instantly reversed direction and began moving south at a high rate of speed.  as it changed direction, a second smaller and dimmer light appeared behind the larger light and followed it out of sight.  i lost both lights in the tree line.  i estimate its elevation at between 2,500 and 5,000 feet.  the main object appeared as a solid, bright, white light, larger than any star.  the second object looked more like a small star.  both objects seemed to be below typical cloud level, although there were no clouds in the sky at the time.  the event lasted about 8 to 10 seconds and there were no sounds.  i remained outside for about 30 minutes more but saw nothing else.  my dog did not act abnormally, however a couple of other neighborhood dogs south of my residence were barking immediately following the event.
content.summary: Strange lights

content.detailedDescription:

10 - please descibe incident details = i saw a light that i thought was a plane. but it was too bright out to be a plane. then one after the other, five other lights came, then stopped for a few seconds. after that they zigged zagged to the ground!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

have any further question you can contact me.
neelie ravencast

content.summary: This report comes to you compliments from your friends at  iopia investigation of paranormal in alaska

content.detailedDescription:
I am reporting this on behalf of my finance, who has looked over the report and confirmed its accuracy. i have attached photos from a report of a recent ufo event in sicily on september 26, 2009 that looks almost identical to what she saw but for the coloration, and her report refers to the photos of that sighting...

she witnessed a very similar ufo at about 8:15 am, 17 september 2009, as she was driving on forrestville rd. from heritage subdivision toward hwy. 401, continuing past the power lines on the left near the entrance to stonegate subdivision. around the next bend, as the road straightened she saw a large orb just over the tree line. the orb was about the size of a softball (at arms length), and had a brilliant fluorescent yellow coloration. it stood out against the grey, overcast morning sky. shortly after seeing the orb, it appeared to flip over on its side, changing into a generally rectangular shape; and flew off at an angle, disappearing within a second. there was no sound nor contrail, but she is uncertain how far away it was. a car was traveling in front of her but she could not catch it to ask the driver if they saw it too. the entire experience lasted 5-7 seconds. it was a very odd experience, and she has never witnessed anything remotely like that before or since.
content.summary: Large orb spotted in raleigh, nc

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were listening to the blossom goodchild stuff about the "federation of light" and how they were supposed to visit. well in trying not to be 100% claimed by it, we were unable to pull ourselves to not think about it. so the night of "said arrival" we stayed up late looking into the sky. he was at his house and i was at mine. i went outside with a blanket and laid on my porch at about 10:00 pm. my father came outside to smoke a cigarette. we talked about why i believed in ufos and other acts of this "sci-fi" stuff as he called it. after about 2 hours of my sitting in the cold he cam back outside with some hot tea and asked if anything had happened yet. then just after he asked that and i said no, he asked me what "that" was; first we saw this item which looked like a normal shooting star, but it was huge and shot across the sky, then we heard an explosion and it broke into 3 different lights. we wrote it off as just being a shooting star that exploded upon hitting the atmosphere, and continued on it's path (but we never thought we would hear it). about 30 minutes after that, i saw this weird star above the trees from the direction that the shooting star had disappeared, it was changing colors but just staying there, i was confused and asked my dad if he could see it, because i figured my eyes were playing tricks on my after starring at a black sky for 2 hours, he said he could see it but not when he was looking directly at it, he could only see it when he looked to the side of it. it was changing from blue, to red, green, yellow, and then white. we talked about what it could be, feeling bad that my telescope broke just 3 months before, and figured it was just reflecting off the clouds, and that it was just the city lights, it never moved all night. we waited to see if anything else would happen, at about 2:30 am i saw this item from around that star all the sudden there was an orange light. i called my dad back outside to ask him what it was. it was to big to be a satellite, and moving to fast, but it was still moving slow. my dad pointed at it and said "see that, sometimes planes turn on their front lights, and they have an orange tint to them, it's probably just a plane", but we watched it for an hour slowly moving over the sky, never blinking. at one point it was right over us and almost stopped. usually if a plane was that close, we would see the lights blinking, it seemed to be big enough like a plane only about 300 feet in the air, but it looked small enough to be a plane 2000 feet in the air, i was confused how it could look two different sizes. it was just a solid orange color i went inside to get a camera but it was pitch black and the only camera i had was a little 50$ one, that can't even pick up the moon on a dark night. we followed the light until it started to speed up, just before it hit the tree line it shot almost straight up into the air, and the orange light turned a red color. my dad and i looked at each other, and i shouted "oh my god! i know you saw that! that was not a plane!!" my dad sat down and was trying to think, trying to label it as any and all technological item he ever saw. he said when he was working on the air craft carrier before i was born they saw three of those things, each time at the same time. when they asked the captain he just said "the air force never tells us when they like to run their planes." but my dad swears he was in the room with the radar and nothing came up one night. he said "we saw an airplane and caught it on radar, but something was right behind it, that same orange color, but the only thing that came up was the air plane. we radioed the plane and asked if the captain could see any lights around it, and he answered no, but we followed it until the plane was out of sight, the light stayed at least 400 feet behind the plane, until it just vanished. it looked so bright the captain had to have seen it." he went back inside saying "i don't believe all this crap" and told my mom, she came out and talked to me about how every time about 20 years someone claims to speak to aliens and how i shouldn't get my hopes up like she did when she was my age. she explained that it was a little weird all this was happening on the night my boyfriend and i had talked about for 4 months but that it was all coincidental and could be explained. i called my boyfriend and told him about it, he said he never saw anything but that he heard an explosion about 3 hours ago, when i had seen the shooting star. but he said you should never be able to hear when a shooting star explodes like that. we talked about that night for the rest of the night, i never saw anything else that night and never went to sleep. i asked my other friends and they all heard the explosion but never saw anything.
content.summary: Orangish light in sky

content.detailedDescription: It was july 4th, 1997. approximately betweeen 5 and 8 pm california time. it was still full daylight. family members and i were outside when we saw 7 unidentifiable round objects come down out of the sky, one at a time. they were whitish in color. they were not close, but close enough to see. we watched for i would say at least 10 minutes. then one by one, they retreated back into the atmosphere. what we saw were not planes, blimps, or balloons. we believed them to be ufo's and watched them in awe until they disappeared. given the fact that this occurred on july 4, like many other sightings, reinforced the belief that these might have been alien craft. i am wondering if anyone else witnessed this event over los angeles, ca on that day and time.
content.summary: Saw 7 strange objects in the sky

content.detailedDescription: It was a clear summer night on july 7th, 2000.  me and 2 of my friends were driving a convertible jeep through richfield when we noticed a bright cone of light in the hills approximately 1/2 mile west of town.  at first we thought it was some sort of helicopter or flare.  however, as we watched it, it seemed too bright, too quiet, and too stationary to be either one.  the cone appeared to be shining down from a source approximately 300 or 400 feet in the air above a well-known flood control dam.  the cone appeared to extend from there down to the ground.  we couldn't tell what the source looked like, since the cone itself was so bright.  since we were young, curious, and in a jeep, we thought we could get a better look at the light.  as we drove closer, the source of the cone flew off at an amazing speed leaving behind what looked like a blue lighting streak.  although the source was gone, the cone of light remained for quite some time.  the cone faded as we continued to drive closer to the dam and by the time we arrived on location, the cone was completely gone.  after the jeep was turned off, we stood there in the silence waiting for something to happen again.  unfortunately, no evidence was there - no sounds, no smells, and no other physical evidence that anything unusual had just occurred.  later we told others about what we had seen, and several of them confirmed seeing the exact same thing.  some of them as far away as 6 or 7 miles.  as far as i know, nobody has yet come forward to relate this experience, nor have there been any pictures or video taken.
content.summary: A white cone shaped light emitted by a source, which flew off at a high speed.

content.detailedDescription:
Noticed 6 yellow-orange lights over denver toward lakewood area around 6pm (just after dark) while driving home from work.  i had just turned, facing west onto hampden avenue from gun club road in my car, when i noticed 6 yellow-orange glowing lights as my car was crossing the hampden/e470 bridge.  lights were at a distance across the metro area, in the direction of lakewood.  their movement and appearance stuck me as highly unusual upon first sight.

the 6 lights were approximately 1000 feet over the metro area, moving around each other rapidly.  one of the 6 lights broke away from the others, descending rapidly toward the ground.  the remaining lights moved upward slightly in the opposite direction and dimmed/faded out over about 5 seconds.

i pulled my car off of hampden avenue to see if the lights would return, however they did not come back into view.  i waited a few minutes, but did not see them again.  the entire sighting from the point i noticed the lights until they disappeared was approximately 30 seconds.

i thought it might have been a fireworks display at invesco field, however the lights movement and color did not resemble any type of explosion/fireworks that i had seen before.  there were also a number of aircraft over the metro area at the time of the sighting, however the lights did not appear to have any strobes like airplanes or helicopters.  their movement was too rapid and unsual to be regular aircraft.

i work in the aviation industry at dia, and live near buckley afb. i am very used to seeing all types of rotor and fixed wing aircraft of military, commercial and civil variety.  the lights over lakewood did not resemble anything i had seen prior to this evening.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 6 yellow-orange lights over denver area

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cig', saw a very bright light in the east north east sky.  it was moving very fast, with no apparent airplane or helicopter lights.  the light stayed very bright and moved horizontally towards the north.  id estimated the distance at five miles or so but could have been much further.  my mind doesnt want to believe that because the further away it would have been would have suggested it going much faster than any planes can fly and the size of the object would've been very large as well.  after about two minutes of tracking this thing my friend went inside to get a camera, when it all of a sudden blinked out.  after about five seconds it blinked back on again at the same distance, estimated, that it would've traveled had it been visible the whole time.  it blinked on and off two more times, a total of three, when it finally stayed off.  i was watching from a porch on a hill with two other witnesses.  all of us had a very good and a large panoramic view of the skyline over the trees.  there were two separate airplanes in different directions flying at the same time overhead.  this was nothing unusual to me because we see them all of the time.  i grew up on a military base and am very familiar with all types of aircraft. i am an amateur astronomer who knows what a satellite and a meteorite look like as well.  definite ufo in my book, wish id had time to get a pic....
content.summary: Very bright light, no fading or blinking, fast moving orb of some kind

content.detailedDescription: The sighting of a bright light hovering over a mountain top directly northeast of the boulevard church was seen on multiple nights around 9pm - midnight. when the bright light is hovering a picture is taken and the photo shows an object that looks nothing like a plane or a helicopter. the object is shaped somewhat like a cone with what appears to be windows in the middle. when the flash is used on the camera the ufo quickly drops from sight only to reappear moments later.  the object has been seen in the same location for at least 2 weeks.
content.summary: Ufo hovering over mountains over multiple nights.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter was the one who noticed, just as we were leaving a meeting in town, about 7:10, she looked to the northwest and spotted several motionless red lights. the first one came on, stayed in position a few seconds, then moved to the left in a straight line amd went out. almost as soon as it did, a second did the same thing. after the 2nd light went out, two more appeared at once, motionless. then they, too, moved at the same time to the left in a straight line and went out. i turned just in time to see the last light before it went out.  we continued on to the next town 10 miles away and were there only 20 minutes or so and headed back. a few minutes after we got on the highway, she saw the same thing happen, not far from the area of the first sighting.
content.summary: Red lights appear stationary, move laterally then blink out

content.detailedDescription: I have seen a strange sphere flying object one morning when leaving work around 5 am and since then i have been watching the skies diligently and know very well the difference between airplanes small and large and helicopters by now i can tell by the light patterns what an object is. i was leaving work and it was right around 6:15-6:30 am and at first when this caught my eye i thought it may be a possible helium balloon or a weather blimp, i knew it was not a plane or helicopter. it was fairly long and the shape of a non cut cigar at one end had a white strobe light flashing very fast almost looked like a sparkler and at the opposite end it seemed wider but not to much and had white lights that flashed from side to side and when it was actually in flight going in front of me with the wide end farthest away from me it seemed that the lights on the wide end were more to the left of the aircraft not in total synch but strangely to the outside of the left. when i first came up on it it was hovering in a slanted direction yet seem to be flying in that position  the same direction as i was driving and as i came up close to it i could see it very clear then, it's position turned straight and was still flying in front of me to my right and as it flew ahead of me i saw that it looked as though it were metal and glass, the rounded end being metal and in the middle it was a mixed make up of  glass or clear material outlined in metal, at the wide end there was metal in the middle then the clear on each side outlined in the  metal and at the end of the wide end there was a dome right in the middle of it which was smaller than the width of the end, there was no light on the dome. as it flew beyond me it got pretty far then stopped and hovered there until i came up on it again and as i drove under it i could see it very well and all of a sudden it started flying backwards with the cigar end leading. i thought that it was gone and that was the last of it so i kept driving and watching the sky and was sad that it was gone but from the corner of my eye i saw it soaring ahead again to my left side this time flying fast, and again it stopped until i came to it and it started going backwards again. i remembered thinking does this thing know i am watching it and i wish it would follow me to my house so my kids could see this, it was astounding and i wondered if any of the people in the cars passing by had noticed it besides me but, as it flew backward i figured that was it but in a bit it was up on my right side again and this time it soared ahead flying strangely sideways and kept going farther to the right more toward the west. i was on lbj about to go east on i30 taking the texarkana exit and lost sight of the object at that time. i have my own ideas and thoughts on this but who really knows at this point. someday i feel we will all know exactly what they are....
content.summary: Cylinder metal and glass aircraft with strobe like flashing white light in the rear and back and forth white light in front..

content.detailedDescription:
Dispatch took the report over the phone. steve cox, mufon dispatch 

fireball falling from the sky, split into 2 then split into 4, planes in the area but nothing near it, 5 witnesses
content.summary: Fire falling from the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to work.
 i was driving down commerce  street in loudon.
 there is a train track that run along side  of commerce street.
 i was driving, there was a train coming down the track a few second  before i got  
  to highland ave at the stop sign.
 i notice  the railroad crossing gates was going up and down, while the train was going by the crossing at highland ave.
  that was weird to me.
i turn right onto highland ave.
 then i turn left  at the warehouse gate. 
  there was two guys.  david and jerry  waiting  in a truck for me to open the gate.
 i got out of my car and unlock the gate.
then i walked back and got into my car  and the two guys in the truck drove on in and park the truck in front of the warehouse,  then they got out of there truck.
 they had to wait for me to open the warehouse door.
then i pulled in and  parked my car a different area in the parking lot.
i got out of my car and started walking toward the warehouse door. 
  then david said what is that in the sky.
i turn around and looked up and started watching it .
david keep asking me what it was  then i told him it was  a ufo.
i keep watching the ufo.
 it was moving slow around 5 miles a hour, it was about  200 feet off of the ground flying across the parking lot.
it was a round ball of light about the size of a basketball.
the light was not  like a regular  light.
 like a star light color 
i stop watching the ufo. then i turn around and started unlocking the warehouse door.
 then i walk inside of the warehouse and unset the burglar alarm.
  david and jerry walk in  after i got the burglar alarm unset.
i went back out the door to  see if the ufo was still out there it was still there moving slow . 
i watched the ufo until it was out of sight.
content.summary: A ball of light flew acoss the parking  lot  when i arrive to work that morning it was a star light color but it was big as a baskeball

content.detailedDescription:
While traveling east on harrison avenue to go to cherryvale mall i observed an object in the sky that didn't look like a plane.  it was already getting dark and we could tell the object had no lights blinking at all.  i brought this to the attnetion of my daughter and at first she didn't see it as it had gome behind the trees.  i traveled a little further east and turned off harrison blvd. with hopes that we could see it again.  sure enough it magically appeared again in the open so we could all see it.  as the object continued to move eastward, we re-entered eastbound harrison blvd and made the turn to go northward towards the object and the mall.  i turned into a business right away which gave us a clear view of the sky where the object had been and was traveling to, but we lost view of the object.  we carefully observed the area and sky for several minutes looking for any clue of other possible aircraft, balloons, helecopters, birds, and ahything else that might be the object we had observed, but there was nothing in the area.  the object had just vanished.

we all agreed that the object we had seen was not a plane.  the was not visible trail left behind the object.

the conditions were as follows. the time was 440pm cst.  the sky was clear with a few clouds, but the sky was blue and it was starting to get a little dark.  what made me notice the object was that it was larger than a normal airplane for the distance it was from us and it had no lights.  also it was traveling slower than a normal plane for that size of an aircraft.
content.summary: Flying cigar shaped object observer by 3  or more

content.detailedDescription: Back in the summer of 1994 my folks were having a family pool party. i was not outside at the time, but in the kitchen. i heard my dad calling me loudly from outside. not sure what he wanted i went out onto the deck to see him pointing up in a south easterly direction. coming over the neighbor's house behind us, where three beige metallic spheres flying in a v formation, approximately a 100 feet in the air, heading in a north westerly direction. one in front and two spread evenly behind the first. there was absolutely no sound coming from these objects. the spheres then stopped moving and lined up in a perfectly straight line. one next to the other. they then began to rotate their positions, juggling their positions in perfect unison. they did this for a short period and then went into the v formation again, before continuing their movement in a north westerly direction. we watched them go over our house until we couldn't see them anymore.  at the time everyone was a little stunned by what they saw. i remember feeling unnerved by what we had just seen, knowing that they were not balloons of any type and their behavior suggested deliberate, intelligent movement.
content.summary: Three metallic spheres flying in formation

content.detailedDescription:
Mufon dispatch took the sighting over the phone, steve cox, mufon dispatch

looked like a circle with a ring around it 6 of them, lights were yellowish white, making a octigon patern. prity low twist back and forth, glow very bright dim twist to the left and got bright again. 2 airplanes 1 from the south and 1 from the north were approaching them, objects  left rapidly, witness was north west of the sighting.Witness states it was about a mile away from witness and a about 200 feet above tree line,
content.summary: Saw object over denver.

content.detailedDescription: Seen the same amber lights that i've been seeing here since oct 2008. haven't seen anything since march but they were back today for a good 20 minutes. they would blink off and on quickly and looked like a large orange ball up in the sky. they were coming on one at a time then the final time one came on and went off then another came on a few seconds later directly to the left of this one almost adjacent to it very brifly and went off. its very clear out, they were to the south of tuscola they were also to the sw of tuscola as they were appearing in varios parts of the sky for 20 mintues. even though they were lit for a brief second they seemed to be pretty large i would say almost the size of my first. they seemed fairly close too. these are the same lights i saw on oct 2008, jan 30th 2009 and sometime in march of 2009.
content.summary: Amber lights again

content.detailedDescription: I was heading east on alameda ave.In lakewood. co., driving home from work when i looked up into the sky facing east.  i saw what looked like a large red fire ball falling from the sky, i almost wrecked my car cause i thought a plane or helicopter was going down.  then i looked again and the fire ball split apart into 8 flying objects that were all lit up and they flew together across the sky, but not in a row but in a triangle formation and then they were gone that fast.  maybe they were fighters planes but i have never seen that may at once together. i definetly felt they were chasing something that fell from the sky. i checked the news but have heard nothing, thanks, what an awsome experience whatever it was.
content.summary: Possible ufo siting

content.detailedDescription: My bro in law and myself had just arrived at my house , parked at the top of my driveway at right around 6:30 pm. it was dark , and we were unloading firewood. i noticed an extremely bright light moving from the southwest to the northeast , the object appeared to be cruising altitude for a jet, i see plenty of them day and night. it stood out because of it's  intense brightness and it was moving at a good speed, above average for something that high to move across the whole sky in a minute or so. as it got closer the light remained intense, so much so that it made my eyes blur a bit when staring. as it flew directly over head i pointed it out to my brother in law, he commented that it hurt his eyes to watch it, i pointed out that there were no blinking lights at all, he acknowledged this and agreed that this was peculiar . when the object was about 80% across the sky it faded very fast  and dissapeared completely . we stood there dumbfounded and i commented that he had witnessed his first ufo. we both agreed that that was not a plane and we had witnessed something very peculiar. as far as the sky, it was clear and dark with lots of stars visible as well as moving aircraft.
content.summary: Ultra bright object

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 6:20 pm mst my brother bill called me outside with what i thought sounded to be quite excited. i rushed outside as quickly as possible and he said, "look right there!", as he pointed to be south, south east. i would say it looked to be over the denver/aurora skyline. it looked to be falling straight down, then all of a sudden it split or broke up into four fire balls, all of which were still extremely bright and seemed to be about the same size as original. then it looked to me as if they started kind of swirling and coming together again while slowing down to almost a complete stop just above a tree line in my view. we rushed inside to grab chairs but when i returned the fireballs were gone.
content.summary: Saw bright orange/yellow fireball falling then break up and collect again
